data.description: Implementation of the Log Rank test
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This is a perl implementation of the Log Rank test (aka Mantel-Cox
    or Mantel-Haenszel test). Its a statistical test widely used in
    clinical trials for analysis of patient survival data.

    I could find no existing perl implementation of the test, so wrote
    it myself. I think its a useful contribution to the battery of
    statistical tests available on CPAN.
